Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Well at the end of the day, the teacher is the one marking the assignments, not AI. So the teacher feedback was more useful because they're the ones marking it. The teacher feedback tends to be a lot more focused on certain niches taught within the course whereas AI takes a more hollistic approach as it draws from knowledge outside of the class.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI tends to give more comprehensive feedback.
